Verses: 1 janangal Ellaarum Yordhaanaikkadandhu Theerndhapodhu, Karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki:
2 neengal, Ovvoru Koththiraththirku Ovvoruvaraaga Janangalil Panniranduperai Therindhukondu,

3 inge Yordhaanin Naduvile Aasaariyarin Kaalkal Nilaiyaai Nindra Idaththile Pannirandu Karkalai Eduththu, Avaigalai Ungalodekooda Akkaraikku Kondupoi, Neengal Indru Iravilthangum Sthaanaththile Avaigalai Vaiyungal Endru Avargalukku Kattalaiyidungal Endraar.
4 appozhudhu Yosuvaa Isravel Puththiraril Ovvoru Koththiraththirku Ovvoruvaraaga Aayaththappaduththiyirundha Panniranduperai Azhaiththu,

5 avargalai Nokki: Neengal Yordhaanin Maththiyil Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarinpettikku Munbaaga Kadandhu Poi, Ungalukkulle Oru Adaiyaalamaayirukkumbadikku, Isravel Puththirarudaiya Koththirangalin Lakkaththirku Sariyaaga, Ungalil Ovvoruvan Ovvoru Kallai Than Tholinmel Eduththukkondu Pongal.
6 naalai Indha Karkal Edhendru Ungal Pillaigal Ungalai Ketkumbodhu,

7 neengal: Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkai Pettikku Munbaaga Yordhaanin Thanneer Pirindhuponadhinaal Avaigal Vaikkappattirukkiradhu; Yordhaanai Kadandhupogirapodhu, Yordhaanin Thanneer Pirindhupoyitru; Aagaiyaal Indha Karkal Isravel Puththirarukku Endraikkum Ninaippoottum Adaiyaalam Endru Sollungal Endraan.

8 yosuvaa Kattalaiyittapadi Isravel Puththirar Seydhu, Karththar Yosuvaavodu Sonnapadiye, Isravel Puththirarudaiya Koththirangalin Lakkaththirku Sariyaaga Pannirandu Karkalai Yordhaanin Naduvile Eduththu, Avaigalai Thangalodekooda Akkaraikku Kondupoi, Thaangal Thangina Idaththile Vaiththaargal.
9 yordhaanin Naduvilum Udanbadikkai Pettiyai Sumandha Aasaariyarin Kaalgal Nindra Idaththile Yosuvaa Pannirandu Karkalai Naattinaan; Avaigal Innaalmattum Ange Irukkiradhu.

10 mose Yosuvaavukku Kattalaiyittirundha Ellaavatrinbadiyum Janangalukku Sollumbadi, Karththar Yosuvaavukku Kattalaiyittavaiyellaam Seydhu Mudiyumattum, Pettiyaisumakkira Aasaariyar Yordhaanin Naduve Nindraargal; Janangal Theeviriththu Kadandhuponaargal.
11 janamellaam Kadandhuponapinbu, Karththarudaiya Pettiyum Kadandhadhu; Aasaariyar Janaththukku Munbaaga Ponaargal.
12 rooban Puththirarum Gaath Puththirarum Manaaseyin Paadhi Koththiraththaarum Mose Thangalukku Sonnabadiye Anianiyaai Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaaga Kadandhuponaargal.
13 erakkuraiya Naarpadhinaayiramper Yuththasannaththaraai Yuththampannumbadi, Karththarukkumunbaaga Erigovin Samanaana Veligalukku Kadandhuponaargal.
14 annaalile Karththar Yosuvaavai Sagala Isravelarin Kangalukku Munbaagavum Menmaippaduththinaar; Avargal Mosekku Payandhirundhadhupola, Avanukkum, Avan Uyirodirundha Naalellaam Bayandhirundhaargal.
15 karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki:
16 saatchiyin Pettiyai Sumakkira Aasaariyar Yordhaanilirundhu Karaiyerumbadi Avargalukku Kattalaiyidu Endru Sonnaar.
17 yosuvaa: Yordhaanilirundhu Karaiyeri Vaarungal Endru Aasaariyargalukku Kattalaiyittaan.

18 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkai Pettiyai Sumakkira Aasaariyar Yordhaan Nadhiyilirundhu Eri, Avargal Ullangaalgal Karaiyil Oondrinapodhu, Yordhaanin Thanneergal Thangalidaththukku Thirumbi, Munpola Adhin Karaiyengum Purandadhu.
19 indhappiragaaramaaga Mudhal Maadham Paththaam Thedhiyile Janangal Yordhaanilirundhu Karaiyeri, Erigovukku Keezh Ellaiyaana Gilkaalile Paalayamiranginaargal.
20 avargal Yordhaanilirundhu Eduththu Konduvandha Andha Pannirandu Karkalaiyum Yosuvaa Gilkaalile Naatti,
21 isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Naalai Ungal Pillaigal Indhakkarkal Edhendru Thangal Pidhaakkalai Ketkumbodhu,
22 neengal Ungal Pillaigalukku Arivikkavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Isravelar Vettaandharai Vazhiyaai Indha Yordhaanaikkadandhu Vandhaargal.
23 boomiyin Sagala Janangalum Karththarudaiya Karam Balaththadhendru Ariyumbadikkum, Neengal Sagala Naalum Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Bayappadumbadikkum,

24 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sivandha Samuththiraththin Thanneerai Naangal Kadandhu Theerumattum Engalukku Munbaaga Vatrippogappanninadhupola, Ungal Dhevanaagiyakarththar Yordhaanin Thanneerukkum Seydhu, Adhai Ungalukku Munbaaga Neengal Kadandhu Theerumalavum Vatrippogappanninaar Endru Arivikkakkadaveergal Endraan.
